Name: Buy Beverage
Description: Buy the drink which is depicted in the lower right corner

Name: Chart Course
Description: Tap and drag the ship along the grid line

Name: Clean O2 Filter
Description: Tap and drag the floating leaves toward the hole

Name: Divert Power
Location: (1) Reactor\n(2) Admin, Cafeteria, Communications, Greenhouse, Laboratory, Launchpad, MedBay, Office
Description: (1) Pull up the glowing lever on the device\n(2) Flip the switch in the center

Name: Enter ID Code
Description: Take the ID out of the wallet and type the ID code into the screen

Name: Fix Wiring
Location: (1) Storage, Hallway, Locker Room\n(2) Greenhouse, Hallway, Locker Room\n(3) Greenhouse, Laboratory, Locker Room
Description: (1-3) Connect wires of the same color

Name: Fuel Engines
Description: Fill the gas tank by pressing and holding the button

Name: Measure Weather
Description: Press the 'Begin' button on the lower right corner

Name: Prime Shields
Description: Tap all the red cells to make all the cells white

Name: Run Diagnostics
Description: Press the red space key and, after the countdown ends, tap the red anomaly circle

Name: Sort Samples
Description: Place the sample in the correct box

Name: Start Reactor
Description: Press the buttons in the exact sames order as the blue squares show on the left display

Name: Submit Scan
Description: Stand on the platform and scan yourself

Name: Unlock Manifolds
Description: Press the buttons in ascending numerical order

Name: Water Plants
Description: (1) Find the watering can on the shelf\n(2) Water the plants
